node.name: Hibernate Tools (Indigo)
node.shortdescription:
The Hibernate Tools has a set of views and wizards to help during Hibernate development. Compatible with Hibernate 3.x and 4.x.

Some highlights:

* configurable reverse engineering
* hibernate.cfg.xml wizard
* Hibernate HQL Editor with code completion
* Query execution and result
* Show generated SQL as you type
* hbm.xml code completion support ...and more
